Have calculated Household Incomes for all survey villages (It is noteworthy that there are no official sources of serial data on household incomes in rural India). iii. Currently coordinating a research project examining the socio-economic characteristics of small-scale farming households in different agro-ecological regions of India and the viability of small-scale farming in contemporary conditions. iv. Have published Socio-Economic Surveys for the states of Rajasthan, Andhra Pradesh, and Karnataka (forthcoming) v. Have a archive of primary data from more than 35 villages in India.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Guide Trust was founded on 1.1.2011 and started functioning by the alone given address. The trust was abroad by the Government of 12-11-2014. and was for the expanded by extending its service in more areas. The trust was founded with the genuine intention of helping that section of community which is in need. The trust reaches out to the differently challenged, to orphans women destitute. This trust provides food medicines free education coaching and skill based training to the needy accordingly. These objectives of the Trust. 1. To help the differently challenged to get the necessary apparatus. 2. To help the orphaned, widows and economically backward women to get married 3. To visit villages and create an awareness for education among the folks. 4. To coach the students of 10th and 12th and under graduation. 5. To give training in communication skill both in Tamil and English. 6. To give free training in computer, like MS office, DTP, Auto CADD and Tally. 7. To give free coaching for public service commission like TNPSC etc. 8. TO GIVE PROFESSIONAL TECHNICAL TRAINING IN THE mechanics of cell phone, Electrical Auto mechanism, A.C Mechanism, JCB, 9. To teach Tailoring, painting, Embroidery, Beautician, jewelry making, driving etc.
